document.docAuthor: Marshall, Stephen A., Roháček, Jindřich, Dong, Hui & Buck, Matthias
document.masterDocTitle: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The state of Sphaeroceridae (Diptera: Acalyptratae): a world catalog update covering the years 2000 - 2010, with new generic synonymy, new combinations, and new distributions

mods:name.mods:affiliation: School of Environmental Sciences, University of Guelph, Guelph, Ontario, Canada, N 1 G 2 W 1; e-mail: samarsha @ uoguelph. ca
Department of Entomology, Silesian Museum, Tyršova 1, CZ- 746 01 Opava, Czech Republic; e-mail: rohacek @ szmo. cz
Shenzhen Fairylake Botanical Garden, Fairylake Rd 160, Luohu District, Shenzhen, China 518004; e-mail: fishdh @ gmail. com
Invertebrate Zoology, Royal Alberta Museum, 12845 - 102 nd Avenue, Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, T 5 N 0 M 6; e-mail: buckmb @ gmail. com

subSubSection.paragraph: [Afrotropical species, key, illustr.].

Poecilosomella aciculata (Deeming, 1969)
. Distr.: Oriental: China (GDO), India ( West Bengal ), Indonesia ( Flores , Lombok), Japan ( Okinawa ), Nepal , Sri Lanka ; Palaearctic: Japan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella aciculata
. –
HAYASHI (2005c) : 9
[new record from Japan : Okinawa ];
DONG et al. (2006) : 644
[key, redescription, new record from China , illustr.].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella additionalis Papp, 2010
. Distr .: Afrotropical: South Africa .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella additionalis Papp, 2010: 11
[both sexes, illustr.]. Type locality: South Africa , Natal, Pieterma- ritzburg. HT male (HNHM).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella affinis Hayashi, 2002
. Distr.: Australasian / Oceanian: Irian Jaya, Papua New Guinea ; Oriental: India , Indonesia ( Java ), Japan ( Okinawa ), Malaysia , Nepal , Singapore , Sri Lanka , Taiwan , Thailand , Vietnam .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella affinis Hayashi, 2002: 121
(both sexes, illustr.). Type locality: Sri Lanka , Kandy. HT male (NIID). –
PAPP (2002a) : 118
[new record from Irian Jaya].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella amputata ( Duda, 1925 )
. Distr.: Oriental: Indonesia ( Sumatra ), Malaysia ( Sabah ), Taiwan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella amputata
. –
PAPP (2002a) : 109
[new records from Indonesia ( Sumatra ) and Malaysia ( Sabah )].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella angulata (Thomson, 1869)
. Distr.: Afrotropical: Angola , Burundi , Ethiopia , Cameroon , Cape Verde Is., Congo, Gabon , Kenya , Madagascar , Malawi , Nigeria , South Africa , Tanzania , Togo , Uganda , Zaire; Australasian / Oceanian: all published records doubtful; Nearctic: USA (FL, TX); Neotropical: Bermuda , Brazil , Colombia , Costa Rica , Cuba , Dominican Republic , Haiti , Mexico (GUE, HID, MEX , MOR, OXA,
PUE, QRE, SIN, SLP, VRC), Paraguay , Peru , Puerto Rico , Santa Lucia, St. Vincent ; Palaearctic: Canary Is. ( Spain ), Morocco .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella angulata
. –
GATT (2007) : 303
[new record from Morocco ];
PAPP (2010) : 23
[new record from Ghana ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella annulitibia (Deeming, 1969)
. Distr.: Oriental: Nepal , Taiwan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella annulitibia
. –
PAPP (2002a) : 109
[new record from Taiwan ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella biseta Dong, Yang & Hayashi, 2006
. Distr.: Oriental: China (GDO, GUI, ZHE).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella biseta Dong, Yang & Hayashi, 2006:650
[male, key, illustr.]. Type locality: China , Guangdong , Nanling National Nature Reserve. HT male (BAUC).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella borboroides (F. Walker, 1860)
. Distr.: Oriental: India ( Assam , Orissa ), Indonesia ( Celebes , Java , Sulawesi , Sumatra ), Malaysia ( Sabah ), Philippines (Luzon), Sri Lanka , Taiwan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella borboroides
. –
PAPP (2002a) : 111
[taxonomy, key, illustr., new records from Sumatra and Malaysia ( Sabah )];
HAYASHI (2006c) : 101
[new record from Sulawesi].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella borborus Papp, 2002
. Distr.: Oriental: Bangladesh , Indonesia ( Bali , Java ), Malaysia (Malaya, Borneo), Philippines , Singapore , Taiwan , Thailand . Australasian: Papua New Guinea .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella borborus Papp, 2002a: 119
[both sexes, key, illustr.]. Type locality: Philippines , Negros, Cuernos de Negros, 7 km W Valencia [ 700 m ]. HT male (ROME). –
HAYASHI (2006c) : 101
[new records from Bangladesh , Indonesia ( Bali , Java ), Malaysia (Malaya, Borneo), Papua New Guinea , Singapore , Taiwan , Thailand ].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella brevisecunda Papp, 2002
. Distr.: Oriental: Indonesia ( Sumatra ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella brevisecunda Papp, 2002a: 120
[both sexes, key, illustr.]. Type locality: Indonesia , Sumatra , Aceh , Gunung Leuser National Park, Ketambe Research Station [ 350 m ]. HT male (ROME).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella capensis
. –
PAPP (2010) : 16
[new record from Zimbabwe ].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella longecostata
. – PAPP (1990b): 145 (in part., misidentification).

Poecilosomella longicalcar Papp, 2002
. Distr.: Oriental: Taiwan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella longicalcar Papp, 2002a: 126
[both sexes, key, illustr.]. Type locality: Taiwan , Nantou Hsien , Meifeng [ 2,130 m ]. HT male (CMNH).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella longichaeta Dong, Yang & Hayashi, 2007
. Distr.: Oriental: China (GXI).

Poecilosomella longichaeta Dong, Yang & Hayashi., 2007a: 331
[male, illust.]. Type locality: China , Guangxi , Nonggang. HT male (BAUC).

Poecilosomella longinervis ( Duda, 1925 )
. Distr.: Oriental: Burma , China (FUL, GDO, HUB, TIB, YUN, ZHE), India ( Mizoram , Uttaranchal), Malaysia ( Sabah ), Nepal , Pakistan , Taiwan .

Poecilosomella longinervis
. – PAPP (2002a) :116 [new records from Malaysia ( Sabah ) and Pakistan ]; DONG et al. (2006) : 647 [key, redescription, illustr.]. Note. Not Afrotropical; record from Zaire is misidentification.

Poecilosomella meijerei ( Duda, 1925 )
. Distr.: Oriental: Indonesia ( Java , Sumatra ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella meijerei
. –
PAPP (2002a) : 116
[taxonomical notes, illustr., new record from Sumatra ].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella mirabilis
. –
PAPP (2010) : 23
[new record from Togo ].

subSubSection.paragraph:

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella multipunctata

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella occulta Papp, 2010:21

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella ornata (de Meijere, 1908 )
. Distr.: Oriental: Indonesia ( Java , Kalimantan , Sumatra ), Laos , Singapore , Sri Lanka , Taiwan .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Limosina ornata de Meijere, 1908: 177
.

Limosina venalicia var. ornata
. – DE
MEIJERE (1918) : 323
[incorrect synonymy].

Leptocera ( Poecilosomella ) borboroides
. –
DEEMING (1964) : 166
[incorrect synonymy].

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella ornata
. – PAPP (2002a) :113 [restitution from synonymy, key, illustr., new records from Indonesia ( Kalimantan , Sumatra )]. – HAYASHI (2006c) : 102 [new records from Laos , Singapore , Sri Lanka ].

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

[both sexes, key, illustr.]. Type locality: Indonesia , W. Sumatra , Kerinci-Seblat National Park, trail to L. Tujuh [ 1,640 m ]. HT male (ROME).

. –

subSubSection.paragraph:
Poecilosomella picturata (Malloch, 1913)
. Distr.: Oriental: Malaysia (Malaya, Borneo), Philippines .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Limosina picturata .
–
DUDA (1925) : 88
[incorrect synonymy with
Leptocera ( Poecilosomella ) ornata (de Meijere, 1908 )
].

Poecilosomella picturata
. –
PAPP (2002a) : 115
[restitution from synonymy, key, illustr.];
HAYASHI (2006c) : 102
[new records from Malaysia (Malaya, Borneo)].

subSubSection.paragraph:

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

subSubSection.paragraph:

. Distr.: Oriental: Philippines .

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Poecilosomella pilipino Papp, 2002a: 137
[male, key, illustr.]. Type locality: Philippines , Negros, Cuernos de Negros, 7 km W Valencia [ 700 m ]. HT male (ROME).

Poecilosomella punctipennis (Wiedemann, 1824)
. Distr.: Australasian / Oceanian: American Samoa ,? Australia (QLD),? Guam ( USA ), Fiji , French Polynesia , Hawaii ( USA ), Indonesia ( Irian Jaya ),? Micronesia ( Yap Is.), New Caledonia ,? Niue ,? Palau ( USA ), Papua New Guinea , Tonga ; Oriental: Bangladesh , India , Indonesia , Japan ( Okinawa ), Malaysia , Nepal , Pakistan , Philippines ( Leyte ), Sri Lanka , Taiwan , Vietnam . Palaearctic: China (FUJ, GDO, HKG, Macao ), Japan . Note. All records published prior to 2002 are doubtful (see HAYASHI 2002 and
PAPP 2002a: 118
) and all Afrotropical records are based on misidentifications.

Poecilosomella punctipennis
. –
HAYASHI (2002) : 121
[new records from Bangladesh , Malaysia , Pakistan ];
PAPP (2002a) : 118
[new records from French Polynesia , Indonesia ];
DONG et al. (2006) : 649
[key, redescription, new record from China , illustr.]; GERLACH (2009): 387 [misrecorded from Seychelles ].

. Distr.: Oriental: China (YUN).
